name: The Lost Sergeant
description: Immerse yourself in a city that hides a mysterious secret ... Help the marine finding THE LOST SERGEANT in this game where you have to save bullets, LOTS OF BULLETS to survive. Experience this single player adventure trying to survive the monstrosity that hides the city.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: AMD A9-9410 Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 M430 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 6600K Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
